bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zao 燥④ . Ru men shi qin 儒門事親 7: 食之半載，居然生子，其婦燥病方愈 , “She consumed one half of it and immediately gave birth to a son. The woman was then cured of dryness disease ”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 refers to various types of dryness disease: xia zao 下燥 , dryness below; shang zao 上燥 , dryness above; pi zao 皮燥 , skin dryness; rou zao 肉燥 , flesh dryness; jin zao 筋燥 , sinew dryness; gu zao 骨 燥 , bone dryness; fei zao 肺燥 , lung dryness; gan zao 肝燥 , liver dryness; shen zao 腎燥 , kidney dryness.
